shadow.name: CONTROL
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Biting Through, expressing through control

gift.name: AUTHORITY
gift.description: The gift frequency of Biting Through, expressing through authority

siddhi.name: VALOR
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Biting Through, expressing through valor

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 21 shadow frequency. The control you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural authority. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from control to authority.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your heart. Notice the sensation of control.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 21 consciously for 7 days, the control pattern will shift toward authority.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 21 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from control toward authority
